headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS 307 SERIES VACUUM GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Dual Ion Gauge Controller - Capable of controlling two ion gauges Representative photo
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 307001
Description Dual Ion Gauge Controller
Gauge Types Controlled Ion (Bayard Alpert)
Accessories
  • Power cord
  • Interconnect cable between the power supply and controller
  • Optional 19" rack mounting hardware, can be added if available, +$50
  • Optional I/O connector, can be added if available, +$100
  • Optional 307019 RS232 board, can be added if available, +$200

Gauges and gauge cables are not included, inquire, please.

Ion gauge cables see items 6799 or 179524

Other Information

Follow this link for the manual

307015 standard non-UHV electrometer
307005 resistive degas option
307006 option for sequential operation of second ion gauge
Can be converted to 230VAC operation, request when ordering


Dimensions and weight:

Control Unit

  • Width 241 mm 9.5 in
  • Height 89 mm (3.5 in.)
  • Depth 356 mm (14 in.) includes 76 mm (3 in.) for connectors and cables
  • Weight 3 kg (6.5 lb.)


Power Unit

  • Width 203 mm (8 in.)
  • Height 89 mm (3.5 in.)
  • Depth 330 mm (13 in.) includes 89 mm (3.5 in.) for connectors and cables
  • Weight 4 kg (8.5 lb.)

Condition Excellent
Power Requirements 100-127 V 3.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
